rules_text:
Flying
Play with the top card of your library revealed.
Spells cost {X} more to cast, where X is the mana value of the top card of your library.
notes:
2k17
Name: Bane of Portents > Portent of the Long Winter
Cost: 1W > 3WW
Players cant cast spells with the same converted mana cost as the top card of your library. > Spells cost X more to cast, where X is the converted mana cost of the top card of your library.
